scripts.test: DATABASE_URL=file:./test.db prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.test.prisma && DATABASE_URL=file:./test.db prisma db push --schema=./prisma/schema.test.prisma --force-reset && jest && rm -f test.db
scripts.test:watch: DATABASE_URL=file:./test.db prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.test.prisma && DATABASE_URL=file:./test.db prisma db push --schema=./prisma/schema.test.prisma --force-reset && jest --watch
scripts.test:coverage: DATABASE_URL=file:./test.db prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.test.prisma && DATABASE_URL=file:./test.db prisma db push --schema=./prisma/schema.test.prisma --force-reset && jest --coverage && rm -f test.db
scripts.test:ci: DATABASE_URL=file:./test.db prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.test.prisma && DATABASE_URL=file:./test.db prisma db push --schema=./prisma/schema.test.prisma --force-reset && jest --ci --coverage --watchAll=false && rm -f test.db
